gurmukhi: aurivsxI Sbdwid Bix`jY ] mQxI AMq Sbd iqh id`jY ] skl qupk ky nwm lih`jih ] srb Tvr ibn SMk Bix`jih ]1169]
transliteration: Urvisanishabadaadh Bhanijjai|| Mathaniant Shabad Tih Dijjai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Lahijjah(i)|| Sarab Thavar Bin Shank Bhanijjah(i)||1169||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Urvishani”, add the word “mathani” at the and know all the names of Tupak.1169.

gurmukhi: jgqIsxI pdwid ] AMq Sbd mQxI iqh Twno ] skl qupk ky nwm pCwnhu ] Xw mY Byd rqI n pRmwnhu ]1170]
transliteration: Jagadeesanipadaadh Bakhaano|| Ant Shabad Mathanitih Thaano|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Pachhaadoh||yaa Mai Bhed Ratina Pramaanoh||1170||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Jagtaashani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know the names of Tupak without any discrimination.1170.

gurmukhi: bsumqysxI Awid aucrIAY ] ArxI Sbd AMq iqh DrIAY ] nwm qupk ky sB lih il`jih ] sBn sunq ibn SMk Bix`jih ]1171]
transliteration: Basoumatesaniaadh Udareeai|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Dareeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Lujjah(i)|| Sabhan Sounat Bin Shank Bhanijjah(i)||1171||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vasumanteshani”, add the word ‘arini” at the and know all the names of Tupak.1171.

gurmukhi: bsuDysxI Sbd ko Awid aucwrIAY ] qwky mQxI AMq Sbd ko fwrIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm cqur icq lY ] ho jvn Tvr mY cho qhI qy Sbd dY ]1172]
transliteration: Basudhesanishabad Ko Aadh Udareeai|| Taake Mathaniant Shabad Kodareeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Chit Cheen Lai|| Ho Javan Thavar Mai Chaho Tahite Shabad Dai||1172||
translation: Uttering the word “Vasundheshani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1172.

gurmukhi: bysuMDurweysnI Awid bKwnIAY ] ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko TwnIAY ] nwm qupk ky jwn cqur ijX lIjIAih ] ho jvn Tvr mY cho qhI qy dIjIAih ]1173]
transliteration: Besoundhuraa-esaniaadh Bakhaaneeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Thaaneeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Jaan Chatur Jiya Leejeeah(i)|| Ho Javan Thavar Mai Chaho Tahite Deejeeah(i)||1173||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vasundhreshani” add the word, “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak cleverly in your mind.1173.

gurmukhi: bsumqysxI piRQm Sbd ko BwKIAY ] ArxI qwky AMq bhur pd rwKIAY ] nwm qupk ky cqur skl jIA jwnIAY ] ho jhwN jhwN chIAY pd qNhI bKwnIAY ]1174]
transliteration: Basoumatesanipritham Shabad Ko Bhaakheeai|| Arnitaake Ant Bahur Pad Raakheeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Sakal Jeeaa Jaaneeai|| Ho Jahaan Jahaan Chaeeai Pad Taheen Bakhhaaneeai||1174||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vasumteshani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1174.

gurmukhi: swmuMdRxIeysxI khIAY ] ArxI AMq Sbd khu ghIAY ] nwm qupk ky lyhu sujn jn ] Apny bIc skl mn ]1175]
transliteration: Saamounndranee-easanikaheeai|| Arniant Shabad Kauh Gadeeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Leh(u) Sujan Jan|| Apne Apne Beech Sakal Man||1175||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Samundra-neeshani”, speak the word “arini” and O good men ! know the names of Tupak in your mind.1175

gurmukhi: swmuMdRxIeysxI BwKo ] ArxI Sbd AMq iqh rwKo ] nwm qupk ky skl lih`jY ] skl su kib jn sunq Bix`jY ]1176]
transliteration: Saamounndranee-esanibhaakho|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Raakho|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Lahijjai|| Sakal Su Kabi Jan Jan Sounat Bhanijjai||1176||
translation: Saying the word “Samundra-neeshani”, add the word “arini” and know all the names of Tupak.1176.

gurmukhi: AclwiesxI Awid Bix`jY ] mQxI Sbd AMq iqh id`jY ] skl qupk ky nwm lhIjY ] jvn Tvr chIAY qh dIjY ]1177]
transliteration: Achlaa-isaniaadh Bhanijjai|| Mathanishabad Ant Tih Dijjai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Laheejai|| Javan Thavar Chaheeai Tah Dijai||1177||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Achleshni”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know the names of Tupak for using them as desired.1177.

gurmukhi: ivplIisxI pdwid aucwro ] ArxI Sbd AMq iqh Dwro ] skl qupk ky nwm pCwno ] Xw mY Byd n rMck jwno ]1178]
transliteration: Vipleeseenipadaadh Oucdaro|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Ddaro|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Pachhaado|| Yaa Mai Bhed Na Ranchak Jaano||1178||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vipleeshani”, add the word “arini” at the end and recognize all the names of Tupak without any discrimination1178.

gurmukhi: Awid swgrw Sbd bKwnn kIjIAY ] eysdrrnI AMq qvn ko dIjIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm suGr lih lIjIAih ] ho kibq kwib ky bIc cho qh dIjIAih ]1179]
transliteration: Aadh Saagraa Shabad Bakhaanan Keejeeai|| Es-dararaniant Tavan Ko Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Soughar Lah(i) Leejeeah(i)|| Ho Kabit Kaah(i) Ke Beech Chaho Tah Deejeeah(i)||1179||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Saagraa”, add the word “Ish-dalanani” and know all the names of Tupak for using them in poetry.1179.
